title: ‘Great to Work on This Project’: Rod Ellingworth Aiming to Recreate past Success with Bahrain-Victorious Move
content:
WorldTour team has major financial clout but results were modest in 2024. Can the Briton make the difference?

Read the full article at ‘Great to Work on This Project’: Rod Ellingworth Aiming to Recreate past Success with Bahrain-Victorious Move on Velo.
author: sstokes
